common_0070_rival_00: Buenas! We haven’t met, have we?[VAR 0114(002C)]
common_0070_head_teacher_01:
I must say, I wasn’t expecting to see you here
quite so soon.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0070_rival_01: Hang on, Director... Is this who I think it is?[VAR 0114(002C)]
common_0070_head_teacher_02:
[VAR BD06(0000)]Yes, this is our academy’s newest student,
M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss\r
[VAR TRNAME(0000)].\r
[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0201)]HShe\r
will\r
be\r
attending\r
as\r
of today.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0070_rival_02: So you’re that kid who moved in up the road![VAR 0114(002C)]
common_0070_rival_03: I’ve been dying to find out more about you![VAR 0114(002C)]
common_0070_rival_04:
I’m Nemona! Normally I live in the school dorms,
but home is here. Whaddya say, new neighbor—\r
wanna be friends?[VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0070_rival_05a:
Love that enthusiasm! We’re gonna get along
just fine![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0070_rival_05b:
Huh? What’s wrong—did I scare you off?
Maybe I came on a little strong![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0070_head_teacher_03:
Miss Nemona is president of our student council
and a Champion-ranked Trainer in her own right.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0070_rival_06:
I absolutely love Pokémon battling! In fact, we
should battle right now—you and me![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0070_head_teacher_04:
Easy, now—you two will be in the same class,
so you’ll have plenty of time to battle later!\r
And get to know one another better, of course.[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0070_rival_07:
We’re gonna be neighbors AND classmates?
Nice! We’ll be able to battle all we want![VAR 0114(0004)]
common_0070_head_teacher_05: On that note, M[VAR GENDBR(00FF,0305)]asteriss [VAR TRNAME(0000)]...[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0070_head_teacher_06:
Have you decided which of these Pokémon
you would like to be your first partner?[VAR 0114(000A)]
common_0070_rival_08:
Oh my gosh, your very first Pokémon. I’m getting
chills just watching you pick![VAR 0114(0004)]
